name: frosh/tools
description: Provides some basic things for managing the Shopware Installation

description.de-DE: Die kostenlose Shopware 6 App beinhaltet mehrere Werkzeuge um den Shop besser zu verwalten. Optimierter Cache Manager, Log Viewer um die Logeinträge zu sehen oder Tasks auszuführen.
description.en-GB: The free Shopware 6 app include several tools to manage the store much better like a cache manager, log viewer to see the log entries, run the tasks or see the system status.
